DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate efficacy safety intensify treatment regimen preprandial insulin aspart insulin detemir twice daily convenient regimen biphasic insulin aspart 30 twice daily blood glucose control subject type 2 diabetes .
